remarks: Refine ~ o1bdd2 to give a strictly positive upper bound.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2016.)
statement:
lo1bdd2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
lo1bdd2.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lo1bdd2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
lo1bdd2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. <_O(1) ) $.
lo1bdd2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. RR /\ C <_ y ) ) -> M e. RR ) $.
lo1bdd2.6 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) /\ ( ( y e. RR /\ C <_ y ) /\ x < y ) ) -> B <_ M ) $.
lo1bddrp $p |- ( ph -> E. m e. RR+ A. x e. A B <_ m ) $.
$d A m x y $.
$d B m y $.
$d C x y $.
$d M m x $.
$d ph x y $.
